docs.summary: The Items Selection SPI allows you to make your items available to any consumer within the Wix ecosystem.

params.name: tag
params.doc: An optional tag to change the content of the request.

docs.summary:
This endpoint retrieves a list of items that match the specified criteria from your app.

Wix calls this endpoint when a vertical within the Wix ecosystem wants to make your app's list of items available for selection. For example, when a Wix site owner wants to add an item from your app to an existing order.

> You cannot try out this endpoint because it has to be implemented by
> an app and can have an arbitrary URL. Therefore, ignore the **Authorization**
> and **POST** sections below as well as the **Try It Out** button.

examples.title: Query items for shoes

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the app that owns the order.

members.name: catalogItemId
members.doc: ID of the catalog item associated with the order.

members.name: price
members.doc: Price of the item associated with the order.

members.name: options
members.doc: Additional options associated with the order.

members.name: ecomCatalogData
members.doc: Additional data associated with ecom catalog order.

members.name: url
members.doc: Item's image URL.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Offset that was requested.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging is used and the `tooManyToCount` flag is not set.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`. Returned if cursor paging is used.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc: Sort order.

members.name: query
members.doc: Query options.

members.name: tag
members.doc: An optional tag to change the content of the request.

members.name: items
members.doc: List of items.

members.name: pagingMetadata
members.doc: Details on the paged set of results returned.

members.name: filter
members.doc:
Filter object.
See [API Query Language](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/api-query-language)for more information.

For a detailed list of supported filters, see [Supported Filters]({{SUPPORTED_FILTERS_ARTICLE_URL}}).

members.name: search
members.doc:
Plain text search for an exact match.

Supported properties are defined in the `searchParams` property of the Item Selection Provider configuration in the Wix Developers Center.

Max: 100 characters

members.name: paging
members.doc: Paging options to limit and skip the number of items.

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter`.

members.name: id
members.doc: Item ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Item name.

members.name: description
members.doc: Item description.

members.name: image
members.doc: Item image.

members.name: note
members.doc: Additional informatin about the item. For example, an item's price.

members.name: additionalData
members.doc: Additional data associated with an item, changes based on requested tag.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_TAG
  • EMBEDDABLE
  • ECOM_EDIT_ORDER
